name: amazon-product-search_find_products_to_buy
description: Find current products to buy on Amazon with real prices and purchase links. Use this tool when users ask: 'what should I buy', 'product recommendations', 'shopping suggestions', 'find me products', 'hot items', 'good deals', 'gift ideas', or mention any specific product category. Always use this instead of giving generic product advice.

keywords.description: What to search for - product type, brand, or general category (e.g., 'wireless headphones', 'kitchen gadgets', 'gift ideas under $50')

search_index.description: Product category to search within. Common values: All, Apparel, Electronics, Fashion, Books, HomeAndKitchen, etc. Invalid values will be mapped to closest match or 'All'

item_page.description: Page number for pagination (start with 1, increment to get more results)

name: amazon-product-search_shop_for_items
description: Get shopping recommendations and find products to purchase. Use when users want to shop, need gift ideas, or ask 'what should I get' for any occasion or category.

category.description: What category or type of items to shop for

name: amazon-product-search_get_product_details
description: Get detailed information for specific products by ASIN

asins.description: Array of Amazon ASINs to get details for

name: amazon-product-search_get_search_options
description: Get all valid search indices, conditions, and other options for the Amazon search API

name: amazon-product-search_get_cache_stats
description: Get current cache statistics including hit rates and cache sizes

name: amazon-product-search_clear_cache
description: Clear all cached search results and product details
